name: Google Analytics 4 Specialist
anti_patterns: Do NOT use for general web search. Do NOT infer traffic numbers without running a report. Do NOT attempt to configure GA4 properties (read-only).

name: Brave Search Specialist
anti_patterns: Do NOT use for internal codebase search. Do NOT use for specific database queries.

name: Cloud Run Specialist
capabilities: list_services, get_service, get_service_log, deploy_file_contents, deploy_local_folder, list_projects, create_project
anti_patterns: Do NOT use for general GCP operations outside Cloud Run. Do NOT deploy without user confirmation.

name: Code Execution Specialist
anti_patterns: Do NOT use for system-level operations (e.g. installing packages) unless explicitly allowed. Do NOT access external APIs unless network access is confirmed.

name: Database Specialist
capabilities: postgres_execute_sql, postgres_list_tables, postgres_list_indexes, postgres_database_overview, postgres_list_active_queries, query_agent_analytics
anti_patterns: Do NOT drop tables without explicit user confirmation. Do NOT execute unrestricted DELETE/UPDATE queries without WHERE clauses.

name: Filesystem Specialist
capabilities: read_text_file, read_media_file, read_multiple_files, write_file, edit_file, create_directory, list_directory, list_directory_with_sizes, move_file, search_files, directory_tree, get_file_info, list_allowed_directories
anti_patterns: Do NOT access files outside the allowed directories. Do NOT overwrite critical configuration files without backup. Use `dryRun` first when using `edit_file`.

name: GCloud Specialist
anti_patterns: Do NOT run interactive commands. Do NOT execute destructive commands without confirmation.

name: GitHub Specialist
capabilities: search_repositories, list_repositories, get_file_contents, create_or_update_file, push_files, create_issue, list_issues, update_issue, add_issue_comment, create_pull_request, list_pull_requests, merge_pull_request, get_pull_request, create_branch, list_branches, get_commit, search_code, search_issues
anti_patterns: Do NOT commit secrets or sensitive data. Do NOT force push to main/master branches.

name: Google Search Specialist
anti_patterns: Do NOT hallucinate search results. Always rely on the tool output.

name: Monitoring & Observability Specialist
capabilities: list_log_entries, list_log_names, list_buckets, list_views, list_sinks, list_log_scopes, list_metric_descriptors, list_time_series, list_alert_policies, list_traces, get_trace, list_group_stats
anti_patterns: Do NOT fetch excessive amounts of log data without limits.

name: Puppeteer Browser Automation Specialist
capabilities: puppeteer_navigate, puppeteer_screenshot, puppeteer_click, puppeteer_fill, puppeteer_evaluate, puppeteer_hover
anti_patterns: Do NOT use for highly interactive sites requiring complex login flows without careful script management.

name: Sequential Thinking Specialist
anti_patterns: Do NOT rush to a conclusion without going through the necessary thinking steps. Do NOT stop thinking until `nextThoughtNeeded` is false.

name: Google Cloud Storage Specialist
capabilities: list_objects, read_object_metadata, read_object_content, delete_object, write_object, update_object_metadata, copy_object, move_object, upload_object, download_object, list_buckets, create_bucket, delete_bucket, get_bucket_metadata, update_bucket_labels, get_bucket_location, view_iam_policy, check_iam_permissions, get_metadata_table_schema, execute_insights_query, list_insights_configs
anti_patterns: Do NOT download large objects without confirmation. Do NOT delete buckets regardless if they are empty without explicit user consent.
